issue.title: ourdream.ai
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
[NSFW] [http://ourdream.ai](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fourdream.ai)
### Comment
> AdGuard DNS is blocking core.ourdream.ai and all its subdomains (e.g., api.core.ourdream.ai), returning 0.0.0.0 instead of the correct IP.
> 
> Verification:
> $ dig `@94.140.14.14` core.ourdream.ai +short
> 0.0.0.0
> $ dig `@94.140.14.14` api.core.ourdream.ai +short
> 0.0.0.0
> $ dig `@8.8.8.8` core.ourdream.ai +short
> wqisdlh1.up.railway.app.
> 66.33.22.31
> 
> About the domain:
> ourdream.ai is a legitimate SaaS application.
> 
> The main domain ourdream.ai is not blocked, only the core subdomain.
> Our users who use AdGuard DNS are unable to access our service. Many have reported that switching to automatic/default DNS resolves the issue.

### [NSFW] Screenshots

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: kinogo.tours
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://kinogo.tours/28894-park-jurskogo-perioda-3.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkinogo.tours%2F28894-park-jurskogo-perioda-3.html) ### Comment > Здраствуйте, > > Использую платную версию AdGuard однако столкнулся с проблемой некорректной работы блокировщика рекламы на планшете Samsung Tab 10 > > Суть проблемы: > > 1) реклама не блокируется на большинстве сайтов > 2) реклама оттображается в Гугле > 3) реклама присутствует на сайте HDRrzka, Kinogo > 4) на YOUTUBE постоянно показывается видеореклама > 5) фактически блокировка рекламы на планшете не работает > > Прошу раъяснить по какой причине AdGuard не работает на планшете. > > Ожидаю решения проблемы так как при наличие платной лицензии сервис должен выполнять заявленные функции. > > В уважжением > Ренат ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/rm4hwfj5gasgc08wswwc0ccko4swkowe3v2twzju8o.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/tbccit9mhxc4w40o440ck0kksgk8oog38xp2c1c626.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.12.1 System version: | `Android 16` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
AdGuard Base

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian Custom filters: | `пропускает рекламу на KINOGO, HDREZKA, YOUTUBE и на многих других сайтах` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12.1&system_version=Android+16&browser=chrome&filters=1.11.2.208&custom_filters=%25D0%25BF%25D1%2580%25D0%25BE%25D0%25BF%25D1%2583%25D1%2581%25D0%25BA%25D0%25B0%25D0%25B5%25D1%2582%2520%25D1%2580%25D0%25B5%25D0%25BA%25D0%25BB%25D0%25B0%25D0%25BC%25D1%2583%2520%25D0%25BD%25D0%25B0%2520KINOGO%252C%2520HDREZKA%252C%2520YOUTUBE%2520%25D0%25B8%2520%25D0%25BD%25D0%25B0%2520%25D0%25BC%25D0%25BD%25D0%25BE%25D0%25B3%25D0%25B8%25D1%2585%2520%25D0%25B4%25D1%2580%25D1%2583%25D0%25B3%25D0%25B8%25D1%2585%2520%25D1%2581%25D0%25B0%25D0%25B9%25D1%2582%25D0%25B0%25D1%2585&userscripts=https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.meta.js&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.enabled=false&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&license_type=paid)

 [https://www.transfermarkt.com.tr/arda-guler/profil/spieler/861410](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.transfermarkt.com.tr%2Farda-guler%2Fprofil%2Fspieler%2F861410)

> Today, AdGuard DNS, which was working until 11:00, suddenly stopped blocking ads, and ads started appearing on all websites.

</details>

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: atresplayer.com
issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version uBlock Origin ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Brave ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.atresplayer.com/directos/antena3/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots ## Issue with AdGuard Cookie Notices filter The problem occurs due to this exact filter: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections/cookies_specific.txt#L2255 `atresplayer.com#$##didomi-host ~ div div[class^="style__StyledBackground-"] { display: none !important; }` The issue occurs here (no signup required): https://www.atresplayer.com/directos/antena3/ When disabling that filter (in uBO syntax) `atresplayer.com#@##didomi-host ~ div div[class^="style__StyledBackground-"]:style(display: none !important;)`, the issue gets solved. Default filter (###): After disabling the filter (#@##): ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition
